type: Ventilation and cooling system maintenance at Sept-Iles airport
short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) is calling for a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of maintenance services for a ventilation and cooling system located in Sept-Îles, Quebec, Canada.
description: The Procuring entity is looking for a contractor to maintain the ventilation and cooling system in Sept-Îles, Quebec, Canada. The system includes all necessary equipment, such as chillers, cooling towers, and associated controls.
full_summary:
# Ventilation and Cooling System Maintenance Services for Sept-Îles Airport

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Issued By:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)

### Date:
2024-03-19

## Request Summary
PWGSC (Public Works and Government Services Canada) is soliciting proposals from qualified vendors for maintenance services for the ventilation and chiller system located at Sept-Îles Airport, in Sept-Îles, Quebec, Canada.

## Description of Work
Maintenance services for the ventilation and chiller system, as described in Annex A, are to be provided.

## Eligibility Criteria
Bidders must meet the eligibility criteria as outlined in the solicitation document.

## Tender Overview
The tender has the following details:
- ** Solicitation Number:** WS4435666063
- **Publication Date:** 2024-03-19
- **Closing Date:** 2024-04-29 @ 14:00:00 (already expired)
- **Trade Agreements:** The tender is open to bidders from countries that are signatories to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements listed in the solicitation document.

## Key Tender Information
- **Tender Status:** Expired
- **Regions of Delivery:** Sept-Îles, Quebec, Canada
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End-User Entity:** Department of Transport (TC)
- **Contract Contact:** Emmanuelle Marchand (email: emmanuelle.marchand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19149040?extsite=MTkxNDkwNDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Solicitation Instructions
For more information, vendors can view the solicitation document and amendments at the specified notice URL. Interested bidders should submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions provided.
